pages.text: Aerochromel is the material required to make Aerochromel Rotor blades. Aerochromel Blend can be made using the recipe above.
Once you have Aerochromel Blend, you must then use a furnace (or equivalent) to turn it into an ingot. It's now ready to be used to make an Aerochromel Rotor Blade.
Aerochromel ingots can also be turned into nuggets. They currently serve no purpose and exist purely for continuity reasons.
